problem.markdown:
1. Function prototype is required in every program ( ) True (x) False
Functions can return more than one value at a time ( ) True (x) False
What is the default return value of a function? (x) int ( ) Void ( ) No default return type ( ) Boolean
Which of the following is an invalid function prototype? ( ) float fun(int aa, int bb); ( ) float fun(int aa, int ); ( ) float fun(float , int ); (x) float fun(int aa, bb);
What is the return type of the function with prototype: "int func(char x, float v, double t);" ( ) char (x) int ( ) float ( ) double
problem.p: 1. Function prototype is required in every program
